channel.title: You carnt kill me!
channel.description:
Ok my npcs dont die....i can only use melee when there hitpoints are 0 after that i can only use mage for example a man lvl 2 7 hitpoints i hit that 7 so then he has no hitpoints i cannot hit him again with melee and can only use mage but somemonsters do die like i have 3 dustdevils in 1 row 1 devil he DOES die and drops items 2 devil stay alife with no hitpoints 3 devil stay alife with no hitpoints
can someone please help me out i will be very happy as i really want this sused before tmmorow thanks

item.title: You carnt kill me!
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

idk put something like

if(npcs[i].HP <= 0) {
npcs[i].ApplyDead();
}

that probably would never work but you get the picture

Read full topic
